contentfulSermon.title: Acts: Part 7 - How to Deal with Church Conflict

fields.notesFormatted:
How do we get to 6:7?

Things we need to remember...

  1. We are called to serve others.

    Matthew 4:23

    Galations 6:10

  2. We all have an essential role to play.

    Acts 6:2

    Romans 12:4-8

    1 Corinthians 12

  3. Be the solution, not just the highlighter.

    Acts 6:3

    1 Peter 4:10-11

The Gospel:

Romans 6:23
